Localization.Name: KnightBridge Arms
Localization.Description: Headquartered in the Kiel system, KnightBridge Arms is there to protect you and yours. With a weapon for every price point, you can rest assured that KnightBridge has your back.

English.Name: KnightBridge Arms
English.Description: Headquartered in the Kiel system, KnightBridge Arms is there to protect you and yours. With a weapon for every price point, you can rest assured that KnightBridge has your back.

Localization.Name: 11-Series Broadsword Cannon
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: KnightBridge Arms
Item Type: Ballistic Cannon
Size: 3

The 11-Series Broadsword from KnightBridge Arms is the size three ballistic autocannon pilots come to when they want the 3 D’s: distance, dependability and damage.
